A hospital with good reputation. Easy to find medical resources once you and your family need medical care.

Boring work. Everything is so routine. Employees in this hospital have been divided into two kinds. One is as pubic servants who have very high salary and full bonus. But the rest are contract employees hired by hospital. In contrast those contract employees have relatively low salary and poor bonus even though their loading is the same. Most public servants in this hospital can be promoted to supervisors or management board but the chance for the contract ones is rare.

Excellent research environment with all facilities at one place.....well funded projects so no shortage of money for research.. but need to do hard work to get funds...its really difficult but not impossible....I received two grants of 30 million NTD twice....
